website_summaries.verdict: Some Fossil watch owners prefer a leather bracelet to metal; Cuff's band is very comfortable calfskin.
pros: Same chronograph elements as higher-end models
Simple clock-face graphic for minimalist appearance
cons: Band may be too small for larger wrists

customer_reviews.title: PICTURES DO NOT MATCH PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is good but the band is not genuine leather and do not match not what the pictures represent. The leather is not supple, the color is a weird grey brown, the holes are circular, not thin. I believe this supplier ripped off the original fossil band and put in a Chinese fake. Good thing there's free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Nishbot

customer_reviews.title: Better in person!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous watch! My husband loves Fossil watches and loves leather bands. Not many watches with leather bands look very "rugged and sturdy," according to my husband. This was so much more impressive in person. It looks great against his tan skin. The hands glow at night. The time has been steady and accurate. I will update this review to 5 stars after 6 months if it is still working correctly and in good condition. **UPDATE 8 months later** This watch is still in perfect working order and still looks fantastic. The band is holding up nicely and the time is still accurate. I love it almost as much as my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: This watch I received was used. No tags, box, or protectors film on face of watch.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna20

customer_reviews.title: First Fossil watch
customer_reviews.text: First Fossil watch. Just got it and it looks great and feels sturdy. Works for both casual and formal wear. Love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marfori

customer_reviews.title: Small band
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Band is very small. I'm about an average size guy from Louisiana and I can barely get the band on the 2nd to last hole....other than that, seems to be good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this watch for a while, and decided to gift myself for christmas! I wear this watch almost every day! Looks great, accurate, and the time is easy to read! I love the analog look over the digital watches. I love fossil watches. Classy, durable, and goes with any outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch with one big negative
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star if it wasn't for the band/strap that comes with this watch. The band that came with my watch doesn't match the one in the Amazon ad. I haven't experienced a cracking band myself but I can see why some reviewers disliked this watchmen. The band looks like it will not last that long. That is a shame because it is a very nice watch! Nice design and color, accurate, and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Ordering Rookie

customer_reviews.title: Men's watch in purple tin with pink and purple hearts all over!! Really??!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this is supposed to be a men's watch!!! it came in a purple tin with hearts pink and purple all over it! This is a gift for a 16 year old teen!!! How embarrassing, don't think he'll be impressed! Disappointed that an expensive, me brand watch would come packaged like this with even a dent in the girls tin as well. Even the face of the watch has some white sticky stuff on it that I can't get off but fortunately, I think it's a piece of tape or something across of it. Hope my son can get past the girl tin to see what's inside...
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom of five

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The band is sturdy leather and the watch is solid and pretty damage resistant. I have a tendency to hit my watch on counter corners and door jams and not a scratch so far on crystal or watch body. It isn't as heavy as I thought it would be; the leather band is a lot lighter than a solid metal one. Keeps good time so far; hasn't lost any significant time since I first set it. Might be off a few seconds only the last few months. I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Joel W. Crowell

customer_reviews.title: What can I say...Fossil did it again.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but Im still a fan of fossil watches....this is the fourth I've owned.....been using it for over 4 years and so far it is still looking awesome...the leather bracelet does have some cracks on the inner side so I may need to replace it soon )as expected)...but is definetely a durable, reliable and good looking watch!
customer_reviews.author: jopm

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality, accuracy or reliability I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice at first but then the accuracy started to fail. Some days it would be fine but then other days it would be 20-30 min off. Not sure what the deal is.. the leather band did not hold up long for me either. Threads came loose. Definitely not a watch to be worked. It’s just a watch for show in my opinion. I expected more quality and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua VanBuskirk

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use without using a manual
customer_reviews.text: Ive been through 4 different style watches and this finally fit the bill. Works great and easy to use without using a manual. Its simple and doesnt have a lot of features but I dont need a rocket remote on my wrist. The leather also does well in the shower too which is a must. If i take my watch off I never remember to put it back on. Just wish it had illuminated hands and it would be out of the park.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Having lost an eye a year ago, I find it difficult to see the hands well on most watches. These hands are easy to read without settling for a plain black on white style. The first one I received didn't work. They shipped me another one immediately without requiring a returned item before shipping. And I do like the rugged look.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: great watch but....
customer_reviews.text: great watch is looks great and keeps good time and comfortable to wear all day with no adjustments. I wore it for holiday weekend trip and it looks far more expensive than what it cost me. I bought the black band and leather looks good now because it is new but it is not best quality of leather and will need replacing soon if you choose to wear the watch every day. The watch band's quality is the reason i only gave the watch 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: TTRV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to purchase cause there was several bad reviews. I loved the watch so went it for it. After purchasing I realized some people are just impossible to please. This was an excellent purchase at an excellent price. I am a watch guy with a couple of high end watches. This watch has become my everyday watch pretty much straight out of the box. It's sharp and looks even better in person. Keeps perfect time so far. I am glad I ignored the hard to please people! This watch is a home run and fist bump 💥👊🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, Great looking, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch after I had bough the Fossil Coachman in brown which I love as well. They are both very Similar yet quite a different look (Style). The blue face makes it stand out and have received compliments on it the first few days I have worn it. The only downside is that you can read the time if you are in a dark environment. But other than that it is a great looking watch!!
customer_reviews.author: John Brodie

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Received watch and it didn’t keep time. Looks like the minute hand was bent. I contacted seller and returned and received a replacement that works fine. The watch is nice and seller was helpful but communication was a little off. They would reply to your messages in the middle of the night. I’m not sure they are in the US. But overall our problem was fixed promptly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, leather band is inferior than expected
customer_reviews.text: For the money you spend you get a great look watch, that is just as described. It is comfortable to wear and matches about every style. Only downside is the leather and band aren’t the same as Fossil watches. This one is really close, but the actual hole cutouts are round and not rectangle. The leather itself is an inferior grade that doesn’t quite grab your attention like real leather. Still overall a good watch.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper Cornaby

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and I have to say it's very attractive. My only peeve is the box that it came in. Why would such a masculine watch be put in such feminine packaging? I'm not sure if I want to give it to him in that box... He might think it's a joke... Or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kamira

customer_reviews.title: Great men’s watch for casual look
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this watch for my boyfriend but unfortunately it was lost in a move so I am in the lookout for another one or similar style. He doesn’t miss it as much I do but he probably dk it’s gone out if his watch collection. I’m hoping to replace it before he notices. It was a more casual watch and nice blue face accented it. Good but!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Stimmel

customer_reviews.title: The strap broke in less than two months
customer_reviews.text: The strap broke in less than two months and Fossil customer care said that the two years warranty covers internal parts only and doesn't cover the strap. They said I have to purchase a new strap and install myself. The strap costs exactly half the price of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, disappointed with shipping
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is very beautiful, but I was disappointed that when I opened the Amazon package the fossil metal box was open and the watch was outside the the box without the plastic that is normally covers the watch. The picture shows how it was when the box was opened.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks/feels like a great watch. The sunray design is more prominent on the watch face than what shows in the pics. Thin profile. I dig it. The band is thinner (width) than I like, but the watch band I received certainly is not what some reviewers experienced. It’s good quality and plenty of length for options.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Ceksim

customer_reviews.title: Chinese crap!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just selling by its name label and has no quality whatsoever! There's a piece of dirt on the inside of the watch! The watch band broke after 1 week!
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: My favorite watch
customer_reviews.text: Out of my husbands watches this is my favorite. Love the blue face. Unique watch- like the cuff style and very masculine looks great on a man with a big wrist/forearm. Fossil never disappoints
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Look!  Love the watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch was a Xmas present the person loves it. It's sporty and casual. I almost decided on the black one but I noticed that he had many black watches and wanted to get something brown. It was the perfect gift. Just as pictured. Excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Stimmel

customer_reviews.title: Leather did not last long.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product June last 2019. Thinking the leather was strong and will last for a long time. Unfortunately the leather is bad already and braking on every side. Seller please how can I get another leather wristband for this same wristwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Alozie O.

customer_reviews.title: I love the product its my 3rd
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, I have 3 of the and they all work very well, I am considering a 4th. My only concern is that I like leather straps but the perspiration weakens them and causes them to break and replacing the straps is not always an easy proposition.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: A very nice watch with a small problem.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and design of this watch. I also like Fossil watches and I have several. However, when I got it I found the blue tint of the bezel was too dark for me to read the time easily in full light and not at all in poor light. I packed back up and gave it to my adult son as a birthday present. He loves it. He yas much younger and better eyes than me, too!
customer_reviews.author: d_real_yeti

customer_reviews.title: Watch is wonderful, band looks wonderful but is not
customer_reviews.text: 9 months and the band brakes one would absolutely think the leather band would last more than 9 months, the watch is meant to be worn isn't it
customer_reviews.author: Glen F.

customer_reviews.title: What a great gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me this for my birthday. It is now my one and only watch. I love the look of the band, the face...everything. It fits comfortably and I get compliments on it all the time. Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.author: Luv2read

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish watch
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was a great purchase. The fit is just fine - I have normal sized wrists and I have plenty of space left on the band. I've gotten several compliments on this watch, and a friend of mine bought it because he liked it so much. One downside is that it is a litte clunky - definitely a "full-sized" watch, so unless you buy custom dress shirts, you might have a problem wearing long sleeve cuffs with this watch on. However, its not truly a dress watch, so one could argue it's not meant to be worn in formal occasions - I've found that it blends right in for both casual and formal environments. Great buy- five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joshjack

customer_reviews.title: and I feel really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My first Fossil watch, and I feel really happy with it. It's stunning beautiful, the color is fantastic, it's even more awesome to see it in real life. The leather strap is very high quality too. Have other brands like Citizen, Invicta and Timex and this is one of my favorites. Hope it lasts a lot of time!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it! He's received quite a few compliments on it too. Only worry is, not site how to change battery when it goes bad because of the leather on the back of the watch. Haven't read manual or anything to find out yet. Hopefully not too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Fossil watch. My first is exactly like this but with black leather bands. I love the way Fossil packs their things, from wallets to watches, etc. The real thing looks better to me than what is shown on the image. Basically, I LOVE Fossil products. I am yet to say anything bad about them. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! The leather band is good quality and makes it comfortable. The blue color of the face is very distinctive and helps it look dressy.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S

customer_reviews.title: Would give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. The "tin-can" presentation package is ok. But every day since I first wore this watch, I have received compliments from at least one - sometimes multiple folks per day. Although the face is not luminescent, it creates a stunning effect in various light conditions indoors and out. Well worth the money. Eye-catching. Would give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Clive N

customer_reviews.title: Nice everyday watch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the leather strap watches, but I prefer the metal ones. I purchased this for his birthday, and both he and I love it. It's a very nice looking watch. He says it's very comfortable and wears it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Marvalen Reid

customer_reviews.title: Watch Constantly loses its Time!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the watch looks awesome and had many compliments the 1st day i wore it. But over time I noticed it would lose its time, at first I thought I may have set it wrong or something but it happens every few days. I'm not sure what's going on. This could be either a defect on mine or maybe the battery it came with is going bad. I've only had it for about 3 weeks now. I hope the seller could please assist with my issue. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brian NH

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend LOVES his new watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my boyfriend for Valentine's Day and he absolutely LOVES this watch. He has wider wrists, so I was worried that it wouldn't fit, but it fits him like a glove! He really likes that it is a leather wristband, so he can switch it out if needed. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vivien

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great watch so far. Band could be a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Authentic?
customer_reviews.text: I like Fossil watches because of their durability. This one however broke while I was setting the time on it. The seconds hand just fell off. The packaging does not look like the advertised product. There is a 4 paged cheap booklet inside. It was packaged in a Christmas tin. The watch is set in a hard, beige coloured recycled paper. The watch is very handsome, as advertised. I just wish it worked.I am awaiting a reasonable resolution from this seller. One month later..... Situation is resloved and I am very happy. Got back a new watch. .....and YES the watch is authentic. Just defective.
customer_reviews.author: TriniShopper

customer_reviews.title: Watch nice/packaging not so great
customer_reviews.text: Watch is great, fits my husband perfectly and he is a pretty big guy! My only complaint was the packaging, it looked like it was meant for a smaller watch, because my husband’s watch barely fit and wasn’t displayed properly. Thankfully the gift was for my husband and not someone else, I would of returned it and gotten something else.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Coachman Watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my son's 18th birthday. He absolutely loves it! The watch is excellent and fits right. However, the tin box it came in looked slightly scratched, but the watch was perfect! All teens would love this watch. It is worth the money I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Not an old Fossil
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY happy with my new Fossil watch. The watch is "BOSS' with the blue dial and high quality black leather band which is retro 70's. (do you remember boomers?) The only negative is that it is a little hard to read even though the display is big during daylight as the colors and finishes kind of blend together. Also the hands are not illuminating in the dark. I thought they were supposed to be activated by the sun. But maybe its Seattle, it is sunny here now, but me, I avoid the sun a little so that might be it.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design. Fragile glass
customer_reviews.text: The glass scratched in a few days. Fragile glas. Very nice design and style! It would be perfect with zaphire crystal! God for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vikingo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: the watch is very beautiful, the only detail is that the strap is very small for someone with a thick wrist, you must take care of yourself because it is leather and can break easily
customer_reviews.author: Ana Segnini

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. This watch is stunning. Band is amazing. The stitching is perfect. I recommend this product. It’s classy with the side of edgy.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Very dark.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice outdoor sunny daytime watch as the dial is very dark and hard to read, on the blue faced one anyway. But all in all a very nice selection in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Acesn8s

customer_reviews.title: Band Too Short
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch, but the band is so short I have to wear it om the 2nd last hole. I'm not a huge guy, nor do I have large wrists, so be aware that the band might be too short for bigger beefy dudes. Otherwise it's a very cool, rugged casual watch
customer_reviews.author: Lard Helmet

customer_reviews.title: Watch is Stunning!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the watch Friday and recieved it on Monday...very fast shipping. The watch is amazing, it came in a very nice metal container. I've gotten many compliments on it. The blue really stands out and makes it look that much better. The only things i didnt like about the watch was that it didnt come with a manuel on how to set it up and their were 2 little scratches on the inside under the dial, not noticeable but still....But it does come with an 11 year warrenty so thats good. Other than that, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: your mom

customer_reviews.title: Fake Watch
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this watch!!!! It’s a fake. The leather band is too thick to go through the metal clip. You can tell it’s a knock off leather. I received the watch today and it look nothing like the picture. Area Trend is the one selling this watch. I don’t recommend buying it. They charge you $6.95 to return it. Which I demanded a full refund of $85.99. It’s not worth it, look for a better watch
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Benson

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful and it keeps great time. The band is made of good leather. They say the hands glow in the dark, but there is no illumination. I still like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Briley

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The blue isn't actually a light of any sort, but boy, it sure looks like it. And he wasn't sure he'd like the wider band behind the watch face, but he does
customer_reviews.author: Mairzydoats

customer_reviews.title: Seller was thoughtful and handson when a problem with delivery presented itself.
customer_reviews.text: After an issue with delivery delay, the seller worked diligently to ensure that the package arrived on time for my anniversary, as this was my husband’s gift. The watch is absolutely stunning & more. The band is of good leather quality, thick & tough & the face is exquisite & what Fossil is known for. Will definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This watch was advertised as leather bond. I know ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch was advertised as leather bond. I know fossil products to be of high quality materials. This product is apparently not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Fray

customer_reviews.title: More the look and not the time
customer_reviews.text: Love fossil watches and this one is pretty cool. It was the look and color that sold me. But to be honest you can’t really see the time with the pattern and color. And if it’s slightly dark out forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and a great price
customer_reviews.text: I own a brown leather fossil just like this one and loved it. I was hoping the black with the light blue face would be just a nice. It is, it most definitely is worth the price and the company quickly shipped the item.
customer_reviews.author: Dodger 011

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch a couple years ago. It came damaged and I sent it back. I finally re-ordered it. In perfect working condition. 😊
customer_reviews.author: JerkMagnet

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great. I love that it looks elegant and at the same time yoou can use it for exercise. My boyfriend swims and he loved it Just a little detail. I ordered this in February and it came with a Christmas box
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE WATCH FOR THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: This watch works very well. It is one of my favorites. The color of the dial is amazing! My only problem with this purchase was the packaging and the price drop. I paid over $100 for it and the price was dropped to $59 the next week. The watch was shipped in a package with several other items. The fossil watch box was open and the top was off and the watch was also running. Very lucky it was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite watch I've ever owned! I bought one and loved it, got compliments all the time. It goes with just about anything. The only problem is that when the battery runs out, there's no way to just take it to a jeweler and have it replaced because of the leather strap. I was also kinda bummed when I found out that the watch was no longer available. But I was patient and they were selling it again a couple months later, and now I'm on my second one, and I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Litton

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. And for the price you can't beat ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for Father's Day. He loved it. And for the price you can't beat it. Only problem is if you buy it from the actual Fossil Store you usually get a cleansing cloth for the watch and my dad did not receive this. But otherwise it's a very handsome watch.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to husbands watch collection
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing on my man’s wrist. this was part of a Father’s Day present. He loves it, I love it, other people comment on how nice it is. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KrystalG

customer_reviews.title: Display is wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is the third watch of this model I’ve bought from Fossil. I’ve been very happy with all the others (hence the reason I’ve now bought three). However when I opened this one I noticed the numbers on the outer dial are wrong. The ten is where the fifty should be and the same for the twenty and the forty. Other than that it’s good. I would send it back but honestly I don’t need those so whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Better looking in person!
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks better in person. So happy we got this for my 19 year old son. He thinks it’s a cool watch. Something different! The blue screen makes it look fancy and expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Fossil, and I'm quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the look of this watch very much, and the extra band of leather between my wrist and the casing makes this one of the most comfortable watches I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece. But night use is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: i get alot of complements my only complaint is the visibility at night. the hands glow but dont glow enough to make out the time unless you put your face right next to the watch. the band is the best ive ever worn but not many notches to spare for a big wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Megalodonjohn

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift so I do not have the watch in my possession. It seemed to be pretty good quality and looks just as good as it does in the picture. I was worried that the "cuff" style band might be stiff or uncomfortable but the leather is actually pretty soft underneath where it touches skin. My Dad really seemed to like it (Father's Day gift).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Watches are a nice quality watch for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Its a high quality watch and I love the look of it. It’s easy to ready and the timer on it is another reason why I purchased it. I use it to time my students seizures. I just push the button and then my full attention is on my student. When the seizure is over, I can then push stop and know how long the seizure lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great works well
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this watch looks. It could use a light but otherwise it is wonderful and easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Topher Wise

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Its just like the pics, its really nice. I don't have a problem with the band. It's legit fossil leather. The husband will Love it. It will be the Perfect Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE WATCH EVER!
customer_reviews.text: With the leather pad between the watch and your wrist.....you will forget you have a watch on. I will have a hard time going back to any of my other watches.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great buy For the price. Simple watch. works great. Nice build quality. Got my money worth
customer_reviews.author: Anand Ramtahal

customer_reviews.title: The leather isn't real and the quality of this watch ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather isn't real and the quality of this watch suggest that it is a China knock off. It is NOT a true authentic Fossil watch.
customer_reviews.author: LaTonya N.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful for the price! Love the style and design. Feels like a good quality in this price range. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Leather band
customer_reviews.text: The leather band is just what I wanted to keep the metal of the watch off my skin in cold weather. The band extends beneath the watch.
customer_reviews.author: TBH

customer_reviews.title: It does tell time, but...
customer_reviews.text: The watch does tell time, but that appears to be the only function working. The buttons do absolutely nothing. There were no instruction included with the watch. If there is something special to be done that makes the stop watch work or light work, I can't figure it out???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, small dials.
customer_reviews.text: My dad really likes this watch but he can't see the smaller dials very well. It is he second favorite watch so it gets worn the most.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkle

customer_reviews.title: Good, cute and cheap.Great item, shipping so fast and well package.
customer_reviews.text: Good, cute and cheap.Great item, shipping so fast and well package.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: An absolute must have. Excellent quality. Fits my husbands big wrist comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Tina T

customer_reviews.title: The tin gift box for the watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch for my son for Christmas, not for sure yet how he likes the watch, my concern is the gift tin box is pink more for a woman, I was hoping for a gift box for a man because it's a men's watch.The Band seems to be small for a small wrist. Not for sure regarding the function of the watch it's a Christmas present has not been use yet... ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and quality
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks identical to the picture, maybe the wristband is a little more darker but for the money has high quality build and nice design. Despite the leather wristband is thick, it feels smooth and comfortable. The glass hasn't scratch after one month of use and sometimes the minute hand display a delay of one minute compare to the actual time, but nothing to make me regret of my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Watch
customer_reviews.text: Picked this out as a present for my kid brother (college age) for something mature but still relatively attractive and in-fashion and the watch turned out to be very, very cool. It's a sturdy, masculine watch with a great leather wristband and the face is rightly sized for the big-face watches. Fossil watches have a good reputation for being reliable as well as classic pieces and this definitely met my expectations. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Victor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I will be ordering more watches from fossil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fossil Watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is great. I think the metal part is a bit thicker than I imagined, but still is in proportion with the rest of the watch. My wrists are not huge, so the face does cover most of it. I do like the minute adjustments that the wrist strap allows.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch was great I have gotten nothing but compliments on it one of the best looking and using watches I ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Charles A.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch.
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised. Works great, good quality and lost of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! He wears it for special occasions and ...
customer_reviews.text: Father's day present for my husband. He loved it! He wears it for special occasions and every day outfits too. He won't wear it to work, but only because he has an industrial job and doesn't want it all scratched up. The large size looks nice even on his average sized wrist.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lines

customer_reviews.title: It does look 100% like the picture but it’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks nice except the belt is not as good quality as it should be, it looks as a different product in the picture. Yet it’s not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amr Makhlouf

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Looked bigger in picture but ok, not my favorite watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Sabbagh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Bought this for my husband for our anniversary and he loves it. Classy design that will never go out of style!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Old Dinasour"s Fossil
customer_reviews.text: Leather band is thick and sturdy. Yet blends nicely with the style of the watch face. Always gets a second glance or a "what kind of watch is that?" It really looks like a high dollar watch
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd day
customer_reviews.text: The watch band broke where the watch part attaches to the wrist band on the second day. I had thought maybe i had worn it too tight, but even when loose, the pin would still pop out as soon as i move my wrist or take off a coat. Fossil is usually a good brand, but this one's a Dud as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, thick , sturdy, and great feel
customer_reviews.text: Would give this 10/10 , but the problem is that there is no light with the watch. It would be tremendous if the watch had an illumination button. Overall tremendous fashion and functionality watch.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom Lord Klein

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t match
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn’t match and they send a woman box for a men watch
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on an awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this style of Fossil. A really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but....
customer_reviews.text: I overall like the watch, has nice look and feel, several nice options, leather conforms to your wrist great after a little time of wearing. Bad news....can’t see watch face at night, doesn’t glow, and has no light! Guess you’re not supposed to tell time or check the date at night so definitely something to consider!
customer_reviews.author: LKH

customer_reviews.title: NOT BLACK
customer_reviews.text: Hey, the watch is a FOSSIL so you're gonna be satisfied with it's workmanship and sturdy build. I like it. Prior to me purchasing this I did see a review that stated that the leather WAS NOT black. I pondered this and took a chance. Well... it is true. It's a dark brown that perhaps from a distance shows as black. I was dissapointed that FOSSIL would say that it's Black Leather. C'mon people. We know our colors. It's an obvious dark brown and there's no doubt about it. I don't trust purchasing leather strap watches on-line now due to this. I'd rather go to Dadeland Mall where they do have a FOSSIL store and see it at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Thick leather band, fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick leather band, my husband loved it and wears it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Button!

product_meta.title: Fossil Men's Coachman Quartz Stainless Steel and Leather Casual Cuff Watch
product_meta.description:
Building off a classic design, a thick rich leather cuff adds rugged appeal to this sharp steel chronograph. Built to outlast (fleeting) trends, Coachman’s ageless style and effortless wearability is a superlative investment fit for any occasion.




PRODUCT DETAILS

 * Product Dimensions :4.33 x 5.12 x 3.15 inches; 3.39 Ounces
 * Item model number :CH2565
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 19, 2009
 * Manufacturer :Fossil
 * ASIN :B001SQLI9C

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #35,556 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #129 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #9040 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars4,349 ratings Building off a classic design, a thick rich leather cuff adds rugged appeal to this sharp steel chronograph. Built to outlast (fleeting) trends, Coachman’s ageless style and effortless wearability is a superlative investment fit for any occasion.
feature_bullets: Case size: 45mm; Band size: 22mm; quartz movement with 3-hand analog display; mineral crystal face; imported
Stainless steel case with brown dial and date window
Genuine brown leather band with stud detail and buckle closure; interchangeable with all Fossil 22mm bands
Multifunction watch with stopwatch functionality; three separate dials to track hours, minutes and seconds; timer; date window; 24 hour
Water resistant to 330 feet (100 M): suitable for bathing, swimming or snorkeling, but is not resistant enough to withstand scuba diving
